# [Interview #688: Alloy of Law Signing Report - Zas, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=688#5)

#### Question

Will there be an
*Alloy of Law*
sequel?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes. But probably not till
*A Memory of Light*
(coming out in October-November 2012) and Stormlight 2 (coming out in April-March 2013) come out.
